articles.title: Man Utd takeover live - Sheikh Jassim faces Glazer issue, Todibo move 'expected' - The Mirror
articles.description: Sheikh Jassim bin Hamad Al Thani was claimed to have beaten Sir Jim Ratcliffe in the race to buy Manchester United, but the Glazers have put a spanner in the works of his takeover

articles.title: Erik ten Hag has not fixed Manchester United problem that Ralf Rangnick identified nearly two years ago - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: The Dutchman has had three full transfer windows at Man United but wasteful performances against Wolves and Tottenham suggest goals will continue to be a problem.
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag will have taken several concerns into the new week following Saturday's 2-0 defeat at Tottenham, not least a continued wastefulness in front of goal.
